'''Carlos McAdams''' is the husband of [[Cara McAdams]], a patient at [[Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital]].

==History==
Carlos came into the hospital with Cara when she was having surgery to reconstruct her face. He talked to the doctors about her previous surgeries and how their insurance capped out, which is why her facial reconstruction was pro bono.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He and [[Cara McAdams]] are married.
